metadata.description: A group of young superheroes are brought together to form an unstoppable alliance -- they just need to learn how to work, and battle, together. While Bonfire, Frostbite, Hard Drive, Junior, Monstergirl, Thunderhead, Off-Ramp, and Zip-Kid are still learning about themselves and how they fit together as a team, they get called on their first mission involving a giant mummy.
metadata.name: Young Heroes In Love
